attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ASK THE PRIME MINISTER TO GIVE LONG TERM DIVORED PEOPLE EXTRA STATE PENSIONS AND BENEFITS WHEN THEY HAVE REACHED THE AGE OF 60 AND REMAINED WITHOUT A PARTNER, BY LONG TERM MEANING 25 YEARS OR MORE THOSE WHO HAVE STRUGGLED TO MAKE ENDS MEET THE LONGEST.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
